Class ResidualEdge

java.lang.Object
model.ResidualEdge
public class ResidualEdge extends Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ResidualEdge(ResidualVertex origin, ResidualVertex dest, double capacity)
    Constructor to create a ResidualEdge between the given origin and destination vertices with a specified capacity.

  • Constructor Details

    • ResidualEdge

      public ResidualEdge(ResidualVertex origin, ResidualVertex dest, double capacity)
      Constructor to create a ResidualEdge between the given origin and destination vertices with a specified capacity.
      Parameters:
      origin - The ResidualVertex representing the source vertex of the edge.
      dest - The ResidualVertex representing the destination vertex of the edge.
      capacity - The capacity of the edge.

  • Method Details

    • updateFlow

      public void updateFlow(double increment) throws Exception
      Update the flow on the edge by the given increment. Handles both forward and backward edge updates.
      Parameters:
      increment - The amount by which to update the flow on this edge.
      Throws:
      Exception - If the given increment violates capacity constraints.

    • getIdentifier

      public String getIdentifier()
      Update the flow on the edge by the given increment. Handles both forward and backward edge updates.
      Parameters:
      increment - The amount by which to update the flow on this edge.
      Throws:
      Exception - If the given increment violates capacity constraints.

    • getSource

      public ResidualVertex getSource()
      Get the source vertex of the edge.
      Returns:
      The ResidualVertex representing the source vertex of the edge.

    • getDestination

      public ResidualVertex getDestination()
      Get the destination vertex of the edge.
      Returns:
      The ResidualVertex representing the destination vertex of the edge.

    • getCapacity

      public double getCapacity()
      Get the capacity of the edge.
      Returns:
      The capacity of the edge.

    • getFlow

      public double getFlow()
      Get the current flow on the edge.
      Returns:
      The current flow on the edge.

    • getResidualCapacity

      public double getResidualCapacity()
      Get the residual capacity of the edge. For backward edges, returns the remaining capacity; for forward edges, returns the remaining capacity by subtracting the current flow from the total capacity.
      Returns:
      The residual capacity of the edge.

    • isBackwardEdge

      public boolean isBackwardEdge()
      Check if the edge is a backward edge.
      Returns:
      True if the edge is a backward edge; otherwise, false.

    • increaseFlow

      public void increaseFlow(double increment) throws Exception
      Increase flow on the edge by given amount. Also takes care of adding/removing/updating corresponding backward edge if this is forward edge. If this is backward edge, it also updates the flow on corresponding forward edge, and removes this edge if necessary.
      Parameters:
      increment - Amount by which to increment the flow on this edge
      Throws:
      Exception - If given increment violates capacity constraints
